name: Angry Grandma Run Games:Crazy - The most fun games for the bad grandma in you!
name_original: Angry Grandma Run Games:Crazy - The most fun games for the bad grandma in you!
description:
Angry Grandma Run Games:Crazy

Help grandmother run to escape and collect all the pills and medicine she need! This crazy grandma run game is loaded with fun. Help this angry grandma by jumping to avoid the dangerous zombie nurses and zombie doctors to reach your destination and fly with the helicopter. Angry grandma racing has never been so funny! This free grandma games is loaded with ZOMBIES! Don't be scared!

In this old grandma games, you need to complete each level by collecting the most items on your way.
Angry Grandma Run Games:Crazy is a free game that has many levels of fun. In this grandma running games, you will be pleased to collect all the pills but you need to be careful with the zombie nurses and zombie doctors. They are bad zombies.

Help her escape the hospital now!

Each of the 18 levels has a unique design with different number of obstacles and zombies. Help angry grandma reach her final destination and avoid all the zombies.

GAMEPLAY
- Use the on-screen touch-controls on the left side to shoot the zombie nurse and zombie doctor
- Use the on-screen touch-controls on the right side to jump over the buildings
- Collect all the pills to clear the level!

FEATURES
- Action-packed game with the most funniest character ever!
- 18 levels filled with zombie nurse and doctor
- Beautiful graphics
- Optimized for tablets

Download and play Angry Grandma Run Games:Crazy now!
